You did indeed make a submission. I was originally intending to pit all the late submissions against the tournament successor together, but quite frankly I'm thoroughly sick of the whole affair. 

I used Bandicam to record the tournament, using the 720p YouTube preset. Be sure to adjust the preset if you intend to record your tournament using Bandicam, and perform test recordings to verify that all is well.

If it isn't completely clear by now, my tournament is [B]over[/B]. The only things left for me to do are to format the summary post and write reviews for each match. I'm going to be out of town for quite some time on account of the holidays so I would advise someone to [B]please host a tournament[/B] to keep this thread bumped and breathing. Thank you for your time.

Every weapon you add increases your point total by a certain number of points, depending on the weapon.  The Hidden Vulcan, for example, adds seven points to your point total per Hidden Vulcan.  Your point total can not exceed a certain number of points as decided by the tournament host.
